RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 82. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PARTY AT GRANTS bumped with a rival at the start then was shut-off, bobbled while possibly clipping heels then was taken up, saved ground while settling at the rear, was asked outside the three-eighths, squeezed through inside of the tiring pacesetter to make a bid around the five-sixteenths, dueled inside of VANISHED under a left-handed crop in the stretch and gamely prevailed under strong urging. PARIS STYLE (FR) was taken in hand early, went four wide on the first turn, was reserved on the outside, came under urging after being let out near the half-mile pole, was roused three wide on the far turn, came five wide into upper stretch, rallied outside in the final furlong and closed well to just miss. VANISHED bobbled at the start then came outward, raced in the two path on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, took the lead in the two to three path on the far turn, dueled outside of the winner under a right-handed crop in the stretch and was denied then lost the place at the wire. RAYYA VALENTINE broke through the front of the gate prior to the start then was brought back around and reloaded, traveled three wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, made a bid in the three to four path on the far turn, battled outside under a drive while remaining on her inside lead in upper stretch, dropped back into the final turn and weakened while remaining on her left lead to the finish. DREAMING OF MO wen to the front, showed the way on the inside, was urged along passing the half-mile pole, lost the advantage outside the three-eighths, dropped back at the five-sixteenths and tired. MISS OUR HERO broke out at the start, went around the opening bend in the two path, tugged hard at the bit under restraint and pulled closer early on the backstretch, was rated just off the pace, came under urging in the two path on the far turn, dropped back behind a tiring foe near the five-sixteenths then shifted to the three path, spun four wide into the stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Dreaming of Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside pace,urged 1/2,headed3/8,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Our Hero
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,2p1st,mvd up hard held,rated,urged 2-3p2nd,4p,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Vanished
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners Barber Gary and Rocco Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled brk,2p1st,prompt out,lead3/8,2-3p2nd,dueled,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Party At Grants
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,shut-off,bobbled,tkn up,ins,squeeze thru5/16,dueled,game

ENTRY.NAME: Rayya Valentine
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk thru gate,bmp st,3p1st,stlkd out,bid 3-4p2nd,left lead,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Paris Style (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: Walking L Thoroughbreds LLC and Three Chimneys Farm
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand,4p1st,reserved out,let out1/2,ask3p2nd,5p3/16,rallied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 1 1/8M Outer turf CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At TimeO f Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Eighth on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TASS coaxed from the gate, tracked the pace along the inside patiently handled until set down spinning two to three wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive rallying to issue a challenge through the final furlong and was just up in the last jump to prevail. CHILI FLAG (FR) just off the inside tracking from just off the pace, came under coaxing near the quarter pole tipping out, swung five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong from home, dug in under a drive under growing threat to the inside and was flashed the crop to left side drifting out slightly late when nailed on the line. AVENUE NIEL (IRE) saved ground at the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled out five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. IMPLICATED attended the leader from the outside in the two path, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung two to three wide into upper stretch, seized brief and narrow command with three-sixteenths to go, got collared near the eighth pole and weakened in the late stages. UNRULY JULIE two to three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, offered no response. TIC TIC TIC BOOM saved ground near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch, offered no kick. STERN CHASER showed the way in hand along the inside, got set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, got collared with three-sixteenths to go and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Chili Flag (FR)
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael and Kisber Michael E
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 5w upper, up 1/8, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Avenue Niel (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Clement Christophe Madaket Stables LLC Dubb Michael and Caruso Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Tass
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, tracked ins, set down 2-3w upper, up last jump

ENTRY.NAME: Tic Tic Tic Boom
ENTRY.OWNER: Guill Randolph J Steigler Gregory J and Bedard Andrew
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Unruly Julie
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 4w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Stern Chaser
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand ins, set down inside 1/4, collared 3/16, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Implicated
ENTRY.OWNER: Bradley Thoroughbreds Belmar Racing and Breeding LLC Cambron Equine LLC and Laur
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended 2p, 2-3w upper, up 3/16, collared 1/8, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 76. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLD FILLIES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $14,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CROWDING OUT angled in while going to the front, made it tight on LADY SHYLOCK near the five-eighths, controlled the action while inside to the two path on the turn, responded well under a strong hand-ride in upper stretch, came under the crop near the furlong marker and was fully extended to last. LADY SHYLOCK showed good speed from the inside, was taken back off the pace when crowded along the rail near the five-eighths, chased inside on the turn, turned into the stretch in the two path, pursued the winner into the final furlong then made a bid under a right-handed crop, drifted out when switched to a left-handed crop and given one pop inside the sixteenth-pole, was straightened then put under a strong hand-ride to the wire and just missed. JUST A NYQUIST broke out at the start, was urged along towards the rear, went three wide on the turn, came six wide into upper stretch and just got up for the show. HIGH SCHOOL CRUSH was coaxed along on the outside, chased four to five wide on the turn and tired. SIMPLE SUGAR was urged early then forwardly placed, chased three to four wide on the turn and came up empty. SWEET AS SUGAR bumped soundly with a rival at the start, moved up to track the pace, chased in the two to three path on the turn and capitulated. SYNONYMOUS bumped soundly with a foe at the start, dropped well behind the rest of the field, went three then four wide on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Shylock
ENTRY.OWNER: John Grossi's Racing Corp and Falcone Jr Robert N
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,crowded5/8,tkn back,chsd,ins,2p1/4,drift out late,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Just a Nyquist
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,urged along,3w turn,6w into upper,up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Synonymous
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd soundly brk,well behind,3-4wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet as Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd soundly brk,mvd up,tracked,chased 2-3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Simple Sugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,up close,chased 3-4wide turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Crowding Out
ENTRY.OWNER: Walder Peter R and Paternoster Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,pace,ins-2path turn,responded,well out,just lasted

ENTRY.NAME: High School Crush
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,coaxed outside,chased 4-5wide turn,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONA L CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare As sessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: TEMPERMENTAL coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside getting set down taking the inside route into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, edged away in the late stages to prevail. COUSIN KRISTI stumbled at the start, recovered to show the way in hand three then two wide, got let out taking the two path into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared near the eighth pole, ran on clear of the rest to be along second best. KHALI MAGIC broke out at the start, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened. RIBOT'S VALENTINE chased three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. DREAM CENTRAL stumbled at the start, came under coaxing and chased along the inside, got coaxed along with five-sixteenths to go, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Dream Central
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, coaxed, chased ins, coaxed 5/16, 2-3w upper, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Tempermental
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, roused ins 1/4, up 1/8, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Cousin Kristi
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, in hand 3-2w, 2w 1/4p, collared 1/8, second best

ENTRY.NAME: Ribot's Valentine
ENTRY.OWNER: Adelphi Racing Club and Blue Streak Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w backstretch, coaxed 2p 5/16, 4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Khali Magic
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, chased 4-3w, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 63. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KHADULLAH went to the front, showed the way with a clear advantage, dictated terms while inside on the turn, responded well when put to a left-handed crop in upper stretch, drifted out coming to the furlong marker then was switched to a right-handed crop and held sway under strong urging. RUNNING LUCKY was bumped soundly at the start, raced up close on the outside, chased in the two to three path on the turn, kept on in pursuit of the winner in the stretch and willingly earned the place. A KNIGHT'S COURAGE was hustled from the gate, established a good position just off the pace, chased inside to the two path on the turn, pursued the top two in the stretch and lacked the needed kick while clear for the show. SEBA M broke out then bobbled and had the rider lose his left iron briefly, angled in at the rear, moved out leaving the backstretch, went four then five wide on the turn and improved position with good late energy. ONE WITHEVERYTHING was urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn, came four wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. KING KHALI was bumped at the start then forced soundly into another foe, saved ground towards the rear and was no factor. MORQ broke in and bumped with a rival, was urged along on the outside,went three to four wide on the turn and failed to threaten. SMILE TAKES CHARGE broke near the back of the field, raced off the pace under some urging, moved from the rail to the two path on the turn, spun three wide into the stretch and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: A Knight's Courage
ENTRY.OWNER: Brady Horse Racing and Rusba V Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,well placed,lasked ins-2p turn,chased,outkicked,clear3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Khadullah
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez, Rudy R. and Imperio, Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: clear pace,inside turn,responded well,drift out 1/8,held driving

ENTRY.NAME: Smile Takes Charge
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke near back,urged along,ins-2path turn,3p1/4,no response

ENTRY.NAME: One Witheverything
ENTRY.OWNER: Benoit Craig Mierzejewski Heather Filpi Michael and Tynan David
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,3wide turn,4wide into lane,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Running Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd soundly brk,up close,chased 2-3path turn,kept on,willingly

ENTRY.NAME: King Khali
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,forced into foe,well back,ins turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Morq
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,bmpd,urged outside,3-4wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Seba M
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bobbled,no speed,mvd in,mvd out1/2,4-5w turn,willingly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1 1/16M Turf CR: 107. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 102000. (UP TO $17,748 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Ol der, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim OtherwiseC laim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FORT WASHINGTON three wide through the first turn, chased three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, came inwards straightened away and dug in head to head between foes through the final furlong and gamely got up in the last jumps to prevail by a noggin. JAMES ALOYSIUS just off the inside tracking the leader in closest aim, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung three wide into upper stretch, took over command at the three-sixteenths, dug in under threat from a pair through the final furlong and fought on gamely clinging to command until losing the nod at the very end. EMARAATY (GB) coaxed from the gate, raced just off the inside through the first turn before tracking three wide, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive outside a pair through the final eighth and just missed at the finish. DANCIN IN DA'NILE tracked along the inside and then two to three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. NAPOLEONIC WAR saved ground just off the pace, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, was rallying along the inside using the path of the inner chute then lacked room suddenly at the eighth pole along the inside and was paused in behind the leader, kept on to the finish and was outfinished in the late going. DAUNT just off the inside near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch and offered up a mild bid. JAMIE DREAMS four then three wide through the first turn, chased four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung seven wide into upper stretch and had no kick. GREAT KING (FR) coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand along the inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and weakened. MIDNIGHT TROUBLE saved ground in pursuit from near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and came up empty. Please note due to a timing error the three-quarters and one mile splits were unavailable.

ENTRY.NAME: Napoleonic War
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd just off pace, ins 1/4, lacked room 1/8, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Emaraaty (GB)
ENTRY.OWNER: Dubb Michael Madaket Stables LLC and Caruso Michael J
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 2p 1st turn, tracked 3w, 6w upper, just missed

ENTRY.OWNER: Murray Ralph R Menary John Cox Gail and Balaz Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, coaxed 2-3w 3/8, angled 6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.OWNER: Allen Stable Inc and Magic Cap Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w 1st turn, chased 3w, 3w 2nd turn, 5w uppr, dug in betw, gamely

ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd, coaxed 5/16, inside 1/4, empty

ENTRY.OWNER: Bran Jam Stable and Clark David W
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w 1st turn, chased 4w, coaxed 5/16, 7w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: James Aloysius
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, up 3/16, dug in, lost nod

ENTRY.NAME: Daunt
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p near rear, coaxed 5/16, angled 4w upper, mild bid

ENTRY.NAME: Great King (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; O lder, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARBON broke in then was coaxed from the start, disputed the pace on the inside of a rival, vied along the rail early on the turn, was asked to pick it up with three furlongs to run, dropped back outside the five-sixteenths then shifted to the three path, gained to take the lead in upper stretch then shook clear, responded well in the final furlong and held under strong urging. KARA PARA settled on the outside, went around the turn in the two path, was roused outside the quarter-pole, moved out into upper stretch and finished willingly for the place. RACING COLORS settled at the rear, angled in late on the backstretch, saved ground on the turn, came three wide into the stretch and was along for the show. LAVON bumped with a rival at the start, was taken in hand briefly early then angled in, saved ground on the turn and failed to threaten. DASHING DELLA angled in while showing speed, contested the pace on the outside, vied in the three then two path on the turn, moved clear briefly at the five-sixteenths, lost the lead to the winner in upper stretch and weakened. BIG HAZEL settled in the second flight while inside of a foe, saved ground on the turn and came up empty. SAIL WITH THE WIND bumped with a foe at the start, moved out early then settled on the outside, was urged three to four wide on the turn and failed to respond. SHESASCOLDASICE settled towards the rear on the outside, was urged three wide on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Carbon
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,pace inside foe,rail,drop back out5/16,3p,lead3/16,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Big Hazel
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Carlson Dustin and Bernard Albert W
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside foe, ins-2path turn, came up empty

ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,mvd out,settled outside,3-4wide turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Lavon
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,in hand early,mvd in,inside turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Kara Para
ENTRY.OWNER: Stoneybrook Farm Trust and Potash Edward C
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,2path turn,roused1/4,mvd out,willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Shesascoldasice
ENTRY.COMMENT: towards rear,outside,urged 3wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Racing Colors
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear,angled in 1/2,inside turn,3w into lane,along for show

ENTRY.NAME: Dashing Della
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo Giangrande Salvatore and Giangrande Stefano
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,speed,outside pace,3-2path turn,headed3/16,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Glen Cove S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Outer turf CR: 98. Stakes Purse 125000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANSE MACABRE chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled three to four wide into upper stretch, closed well to take command seventy yards from home, then edged away to the wire to score. DONTLOOKBACKATALL chased three then two wide, swung four wide into upper stretch and was roused straightened away after the rider peeked back in upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole shying in under a right handed crop, then shied out under a left handed crop nearing the sixteenth marker, got collared with seventy yards to the finish and was along for the place honors. LOVE APPEALS chased two to three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, angled five wide into upper stretch, ran on to secure the show honors. PERSONAL PURSUIT chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. LADY BETH chased three then two wide coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung four wide into upper stretch, improved position to the finish. TICKER TAPE HOME chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, offered no response. FUTURE IS NOW coaxed from the gate, dueled from the two path with DETERMINED JESTER to her inside, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, got overhauled in tandem near the eighth pole and weakened to the finish. BEAUTY OF THE SEA chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued in the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. DETERMINED JESTER hustled from the start, dueled along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, yielded the front near the eighth pole and tired. ZOINNOCENT (IRE) devoid of speed early on, chased along the inside under coaxing from three furlongs out, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Zoinnocent (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, trailed throughout

ENTRY.OWNER: NBS Stable and Elements Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased ins, coaxed 2p 3/8, 3-4w upper, closed well, edged away

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled st, dueled inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, improved

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 2p, coaxed near 1/4, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Beauty of the Sea
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Personal Pursuit
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, angled 4-5w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Love Appeals
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2-3w, coaxed 5/16, angled 5w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Dontlookbackatall
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Scarlet Oak Racing and Titletown Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, 4w uppr, roused, up near 1/8, shied, caught fin 70yd

ENTRY.NAME: Ticker Tape Home
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 5w upper, no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1 3/8M Turf CR: 101. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Quarter on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRANCESCO CLEMENTE (IRE) hesitated at the start then was taken up, spotted the front several lengths, was unhurried towards the back in the two to three path, moved to the four path late on the final turn, was roused outside the quarter-pole, came six wide into the stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong, drifted in while gaining fast into the final sixteenth and got up under good handling to prevail. ROYAL SPIRIT bumped with a rival at the start, was hustled to the lead, showed the way while saving ground, extended the advantage on the far turn, drew off under the crop in upper stretch, remained clear into the final sixteenth but was caught while clear for the place. CYBER NINJA dropped back early, saved ground on the first turn, settled at the rear in the two path, was roused on the final turn, came five wide into the stretch then moved further out and improved with late energy for the show. SWORE was reserved while racing in the three path, came under urging on the final turn, was driven five wide into the stretch and also improved position. OMNI KING floated five wide for most of the first turn then dropped to the four path, moved to the three path entering the stretch for the first time, was reserved in the three path, came under encouragement on the final bend, spun four wide into the stretch and also lacked the needed response. GHOSTLYPRINCE broke out at the start, was taken in hand before the first turn then rated on the inside, saved ground through the final turn, was asked while cutting the corner into the stretch and lacked the needed kick. FATIMA'S BLESSING saved ground while reserved towards the back, was roused on the final turn, angled out in upper stretch and failed to rally. CLASSIC CREATION was hustled from the gate then taken in hand early, raced in the two path while rated just off the pace through the opening two turns, saved ground while given his cue on the final turn and came up empty. HOLD THE SALSA hit the inside of the gate then bumped with a foe at the start, raced in the three path on the first turn, came out four wide entering the stretch for the first time, stalked the pace on the outside in the three path, was asked in the two path on the final turn and also came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Cyber Ninja
ENTRY.COMMENT: drop back,ins1st,at rear,2p2nd,ask 2p3rd,5w1/4,mvd out,up show

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostlyprince
